casebody.data:
INDIAN TERRITORY ILLUMINATING OIL COMPANY et al. v. J. B. DIXON et al. No. 730. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Aug. 2, 1932. Miley, Hoffman, Williams & France, of Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellants. Willingham & Fariss, of Oklahoma City, Old., for appellees.

Before LEWIS and McDERMOTT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellants.
